node.title: How I usually read my mail:
node.author: Petruchio

data.field: Mutt VM Gnus Thunderbird Outlook Outlook Express Lotus Notes Eudora Pine Elm Evolution Balsa KMail Pegasus Opera Mail OS X's 'Mail' AOL Communicator Web Interface mailx less $MAIL My favorite client isn't listed! Open envelope, unfold letter What mail? Nobody loves me.
